msContents.summary: This is a poetic work which seems to be related to śaivism. There are certain verses that don't seem to relate to the text. The mention of words like liṅga and śaiva indicates that they are about śiva. Folio 118r has only two lines written rest of the folio is blank. 117r is only written in half part of the folio, the right side of the folio is blank. Some folio like 116 have text written in three column style.Verses are numbered and the verses are from the chapter entitled mokṣamārgaprakāśo nāma prakaraṇam and left side verses are from the chapter Brahmadevavacananāma prakaraṇam. Some folio are only incised and some folio incised with ink. Folio without number has a line x 1 śaivamantrañca vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva śivacintanamevacintayaṃtaḥ śivanāmāmṛtama
